title: Ward Buggy????
body:
I don't know how to report this to riot so I made this discussion but I was playing this game and I put a pink ward down and it was showing vision in a bush but it was visible to the enemy team.. (btw it was in the corner of a bush and outside)
This is worrying me o_O

replies.body:
[patch 5.24 ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-524-notes)

> **No more Scarra bush:** Wards that are targeted within 25 units of the brush will now seek out and plant themselves into the brush instead

It has happened to me quite a few times as well. I haven't really been worried about it, thought it was just my computer displaying the effects of the above mini buff wrong. 

Check [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥

I'm a little unsure of exactly what you mean, it was outside the bush? Because in that case it should be visible to the enemy team. If it was in the very corner then it's possible you just missed the bush, if you watch your crosshair will change colour when it is over a bush to when it's not when you are placing it.
